name: C15: Find Out
description: Horror game. In the game you need about 15 minutes to find a weapon.You need to shoot a monster to go through a single mode. Or go play to cooperative mode for fun.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 250 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
